content: Check out the social event for FHIR DevDays Boston 2018 on Wednesday night. We will visit the Lucky Strike Social, an area staple located behind Fenway Park, where you can drink, eat, and socialize with colleagues and friends. Hang out in the brewery and play ping pong, billiards, or maybe even shuffleboard. And, there is plenty of action available in the high-tech game room and 16-lane bowling alley. Registration is open at https://www.fhirdevdays.com/boston/registration/. Early Bird deadline ends on May 18.

Hello
I missed the registration at the Boston DevDays but I already booked my flights and hotel. I am trying to find a phone number to call the organizers, IF anyone can help. Thanks

Answered via PM

Thanks :)
I booked the flights from Dubai and hotel rooms at a non refundable fare :tired_face:
Sorry if I'm not much help, but there is a wait list available: http://info.hl7.org/devdayswaitlist
